feed.title: Taxonomy of Transaction Fees in Smart Contracts

entry.title: Taxonomy of Transaction Fees in Smart Contracts
entry.summary: To provide a summary, I would need the complete content of the email you're referring to. The context you've provided, "fwiw I found these diagrams easier to understand," is not sufficient to create a detailed blog post. If you can provide the full text or main points from the email, I can then assist you in creating a summarized blog post following the rules you've outlined.
